import React from 'react' import PartnersCarosel from '../Components/PartnersCarosel' import BIRTH from '../images/birth.png' import TELECOM from '../images/Telecom.png' import DI from '../images/DI.png' const blogs = [ { src: BIRTH, heading: `E2EM’s Birth`, text: 'In bustling Delhi, a college student named Pankaj faced daily commuting struggles. Determined to find an efficient solution, he founded E2EM (End to End Mobility). Inspired...' }, { src: TELECOM, heading: `World Telecom Day`, text: 'World telecom day, hosted by the University of Delhi, provided us with a corporative and constructive environment. Several startups ...' }, { src: DI, heading: `Digital India Week`, text: `E2EM's team recently participated in the prestigious Digital India Week 2022. With the theme 'Catalyzing New India's Techade,' the event ...` }, ] export default function About() { return ( <>
Be a part of our
Mission
Our mission at E2EM (End to End Mobility) is to revolutionize transportation with sustainable, affordable EVs that integrate seamlessly, promote connectivity, and combat fossil fuel challenges.
Be a part of our
Mission
Our mission at E2EM (End to End Mobility) is to revolutionize transportation with sustainable, affordable EVs that integrate seamlessly, promote connectivity, and combat fossil fuel challenges.
Helping us achieve our dream
Our Partners

What we are upto

{ blogs.map(({src, heading, text})=>{ return(
{heading}
{text}
) }) }
) }
